dependencies.title: Software Dependencies
dependencies.versionExplanation: All dependency versions shown below are based on the current Artemis version ({{ version }}).
dependencies.vulnerabilityExplanation: Artemis automatically monitors all dependencies for known security vulnerabilities. Vulnerability data is refreshed daily from
dependencies.osvTooltip: OSV.dev is a trusted, open-source vulnerability database that aggregates security advisories from GitHub, npm, PyPI, Go, RustSec, and other authoritative sources - ensuring comprehensive coverage across all ecosystems.
dependencies.securityFeatureHighlight: This proactive security monitoring helps administrators identify and address potential risks before they become threats, keeping your Artemis installation secure.
dependencies.infoServerDesc: Java libraries used by the server and business logic.
dependencies.infoClientDesc: JavaScript/TypeScript packages used by the web interface you see in your browser.
dependencies.filterPlaceholder: Filter by name, group, version, type, or license...
dependencies.noComponents: No dependencies found matching your filter.
dependencies.notAvailable: Dependency information is not available. The SBOM files may not have been generated during the build process.
dependencies.upgradeMessage: A newer version of Artemis is available ({{ current }} â†’ {{ latest }}).
dependencies.upgradeSecurityMessage: This update addresses security vulnerabilities. Please upgrade as soon as possible.
